docs.snippet: Kolo and Yaya Toure will be staying at the World Cup in Brazil despite the death of their younger brother in England on Thursday, Ivory Coast officials said on Saturday....

docs.snippet: The two main clubs in Porto Alegre have a reputation for playing the Uruguayan and Argentine way: tough, and without restraint....
docs.lead_paragraph: The two main clubs in Porto Alegre have a reputation for playing the Uruguayan and Argentine way: tough, and without restraint.
docs.abstract: World Cup Postcard; Gremio and archrival Sport Club Internacional, two local soccer clubs in Porto Alegre, highlight how regional soccer styles act as cultural touchstones in Brazil; teams play in an aggressive style that is most commonly associated with Uruguay and Argentina, style that evokes warrior-like culture of region's gaucho heritage.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: In Porto Alegre, a More Dour Soccer Culture
headline.main: Beautiful Game Played With a Gaúcho Flair in Southern Brazil
headline.print_headline: Beautiful Game Played With a Gaúcho Flair in Southern Brazil

docs.snippet: Just working out on the grass of Maracana was sheer happiness for Vincent Kompany on Saturday, especially after a groin strain had kept the Belgian captain out for three days. Now, he says he's fit to fulfill his childhood dream of playing a World...
docs.lead_paragraph: Just working out on the grass of Maracana was sheer happiness for Vincent Kompany on Saturday, especially after a groin strain had kept the Belgian captain out for three days. Now, he says he's fit to fulfill his childhood dream of playing a World Cup match in one of the world's most famous stadiums.

headline.main: Kompany Fit to Play Against Russia at World Cup
headline.print_headline: Kompany Fit to Play Against Russia at World Cup
